title: [The Betterment Boutique]
description: Gold-framed mirrors line the edges of the area, reflecting and refracting light from multiple curving, eel-shaped lanterns that hang down from above.  Smoke drifting up from the lanterns creates a haze that hangs in the air.  Hanging down from the ceiling, a twist of dark blue fabric is paired to each of several hard-backed steel chairs.
